level.heading: Sale of goods, advertising, or begging forbidden.
level.text: It is forbidden to offer or expose any article for sale in said United States Capitol Grounds; to display any sign, placard, or other form of advertisement therein; to solicit fares, alms, subscriptions, or contributions therein.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 10-503.18.
